item.title: FORD MOTOR CO 10-K
item.description: FORD MOTOR CO, which is in the Motor Vehicles & Passenger Car Bodies [3711] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 03, 2023 had 58716 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
